name: Calthorpes Crypt
description:
The following is a VR demo made in Unreal Engine 5. VR is required to play this demo.

This Halloween, explore the abandoned Calthorpes residence, as you unravel what seems to be remnants of a mysterious past. When after Halloween treats, make sure not to bite off more than you can chew!

 

The environment is based off the real world location of Calthorpes house. The characters and events depicted, however, are entirely fictitious, and not representative of the related persons.
